mapper.select: SELECT r.*, COUNT(l.r_seq) as listCount FROM rollingpaper AS r LEFT JOIN letter AS l ON r.r_seq =l.r_seq WHERE r.uid=#{id} GROUP BY r.r_seq
mapper.delete: DELETE l.*, r.* FROM letter AS l LEFT JOIN rollingpaper AS r ON l.r_seq = r.r_seq WHERE l.r_seq = #{rSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rollingpaper (uid, r_title, r_content, r_style, r_expired_at, r_created_at, r_updated_at) VALUES (#{uid}, #{rTitle}, #{rContent}, #{rStyle}, #{rExpiredAt}, #{rCreatedAt}, #{rUpdatedAt})
INSERT INTO letter (r_seq, l_writer, l_content, l_style, l_release_at, l_created_at) VALUES (#{rSeq}, #{lWriter}, #{lContent}, #{lStyle}, #{lReleaseAt}, #{lCreatedAt})
